alert.note: Alert for York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 7:55PM EDT until August 05 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central York County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 845 PM EDT. * At 755 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Yoe, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... York, Red Lion, Spry, Dallastown, East York, Stonybrook-Wilshire, Tyler Run-Queens Gate, Hallam, Wrightsville, Yorklyn, Windsor and Yoe. This includes Interstate 83 from mile markers 15 to 19. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Very heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
